data.description: At Cadence, we hire and develop leaders and innovators who want to make an impact on the world of technology.Responsibilities will include software development, debugging and fixing of software errors, implementing new features, along with writing and running tests.Position Requirements:Currently enrolled pursuing MS/BS in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering, or a similar major. Strong understanding of software data structures, algorithms, and proficiency in C or C++.Experience with Python Exposure to Cadence tools is a plus.We’re doing work that matters. Help us solve what others can’t.
